com.team08storyapp

Class UpdateToolPackage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team08storyapp.UpdateToolPackage

  • public class UpdateToolPackage
extends java.lang.Object
    UpdateToolPackage is a class that mainly works as a parameter object. Since sometimes a function requires both context, FileHelper, ESHelper and other objects, it may be too much for a function to have 4 and more parameters. Thus, a parameter object named UpdateToolPackage is created. Because this parameter object is required only by functions that related to updating a story to web server at the most of time. So the it's named as "UpdateTookPackage".
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 November 8, 2013
    Author:
    Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei Shen
